content: Thank you Darius. This couldn’t have come at a better time. I’m starting to realize my expectations are set to a place no human being can ever match, meet, or attain. Forget lofty goals and ambition. I’ve set this stupid (I’m mad at myself and this doesn’t help) goals and for what? To stress myself out? To kill myself slowly? How did this even happen? What I need to work on is lowering my expectations. Unfortunately, it goes against every grain in my body. It’s like I’ve let myself and other’s off some preverbal hook. It feels wrong. But if I can make some progress in this area, maybe, just maybe some of the anxiety and stress will come down.
